sentences.sentence: Pedro could have ensured a bigger margin of victory in the closing stages, but he allowed Arne Friedrich to dispossess him .
sentences.translation: 佩德罗本可以在最后阶段确保更大的胜利优势，但是他却被弗雷德里希阻挡。

sentences.sentence: And ye shall dispossess the inhabitants of the land, and dwell therein: for I have given you the land to possess it.
sentences.translation: 你们要夺那地，住在其中，因我把那地赐给你们为业。

sentences.sentence: Then the LORD will drive out all these nations before you, and you will dispossess nations larger and stronger than you.
sentences.translation: 他必从你们面前赶出这一切国民，就是比你们更大更强的国民，你们也要得他们的地。
